title: SMC_SMOOTHPATHADDAXMODE (Enum)
text:
TYPE SMC_SMOOTHPATHADDAXMODE :
Mode for handling the additional axes by
SMC_SmoothPath

rows.Name: SPAA_LATE
rows.Comment:
Shift additional axesâ position to end position of inserted
spline

rows.Name: SPAA_BROAD
rows.Comment:
Shift additional axesâ position at the first spline to
start, at last spline to the end

rows.Name: SPAA_EVEN
rows.Comment:
Distribute positions of additional axes proportional to
element lengths

rows.Name: SPAA_EXACT
rows.Comment:
Cut ABC axesâ position functions like X/Y/Z and connect
smoothly
